text: The Struggle Will End Tomorrow () is a 1951 Czechoslovak drama film directed by Miroslav Cikán. With a screenplay written by Ivan Bukovčan, the film stars Elo Romančík, Gustáv Valach, Vladimír Petruška, Štefan Adamec, Mikuláš Huba, Andrej Bagar, Ľudovít Jakubóczy, Jozef Budský, Martin Gregor, and Samuel Adamčík. The film was awarded the Special Jury Prize by an international jury at the Karlovy Vary International Film Festival in 1954. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1951 films Category:1951 drama films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Slovak films Category:Slovak-language films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán
title: The Struggle Will End Tomorrow
